attributes.action: Instruct the police to specifically target cars with defective lights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is currently a huge percentage of cars being driven with non-functioning head/tail/brake lights and misaligned headlights. 

Since no legally maintained car of age greater than three years is ever more than six months (on average) from its M.O.T cars in this condition are blatently advertising the fact that they are being illegally driven. Car light bulbs are too reliable for any other explanation.

This policy is necessary: 
1. To uphold the law which most drivers are paying excessively to abide by. 
2. Will remove uninsured drivers from the road.
3. Will remove dangerous cars from the road.
